text: Edgars Vinters (September 22, 1919 - April 29, 2014) was a Latvian painter. He was born in Riga, Latvia. Vinters worked for magazine companies, but is mostly known for his landscape paintings. He began his career in 1935. Vinters died in Riga from an illness, aged 94. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1919 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Latvian artists Category:Painters from Europe
title: Edgars Vinters
